text: ENSAE Paris (officially École nationale de la statistique et de l'administration économique Paris) is a renowned graduate engineering school in France. It is in a campus of the University of Paris-Saclay.Members and associates Its curricula lead to these French & European degrees: * Ingénieur ENSAE ParisTech (ENSAE ParisTech Graduate engineer Masters level program) * Mastères Spécialisés (MS) Academic activities and industrial applied research are taught mainly in French and English languages. The students are from a dozen nationalities. == Research labs == Research activities at ENSAE ParisTech relate to the following topics: *Economics *Finance, insurance *Macroeconomics *Microeconomics *Sociology *Statistical == Notable graduate == * Hamza Ben Driss Ottmani, Moroccan economist and writer. == References == Category:Technical colleges and universities in Paris Category:1942 establishments in Europe Category:1940s establishments in France
title: ENSAE ParisTech
